title: JBS Tolleson, Inc. Recalls Raw Beef Products Due to Possible Salmonella Newport Contamination
summary: EDITORS NOTE: -Details of this recall were updated Oct. 5, 2018 to reflect additional product codes and increases in the poundage of products being recalled; -Details of this recall were updated Oct. 4, 2018 to reflect increases in the poundage of products being recalled. WASHINGTON...
